channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Key takeaways from the acquittal of Karen Read in her Boston police officer boyfriend’s death
item.description: Karen Read has walked out of a Massachusetts court a free woman after a jury found her not guilty of killing her Boston police officer boyfriend.

item.title: Families of trans kids worry about what’s next after Supreme Court rules on gender-affirming care
Hundreds gather to remember prominent Minnesota lawmaker and husband slain in their home
